roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.description:
- **Team**: Core
- Currently working on MCP protection and API source code analysis
- Worked extensively on source code analysis for API use case and developed a good understanding of LSPs, CPG and ASTs
- Built AI Agents for API use cases
- Implemented MCP testing and discovery with a team of 3 developers in under a week, including SSE and event stream support
- Optimized traffic connectors to handle high traffic with minimal overhead
- Managed helm charts and deployment files for customers
- Implemented hybrid SaaS infrastructure handling over 100k requests per minute
- Owned billing and packaging infrastructure, improving feature packaging and usage measurement
- Built comprehensive features including swagger imports, webhook integration, centralized logging, custom API collections, authentication, data types, and test libraries
- Implemented Kubernetes staging setup with automatic rollouts for testing
- Gained expertise in stakeholder management through customer success work
- Led complete UI revamp with a team of 3 developers
- **Tech Stack**: Java, Go, React, GCP, eBPF, Langchain, Helm, MCP

roles.title: Software Engineer Intern
roles.description:
- **Third Engineer** on the team
- Implemented eBPF, nginx, envoy, istio, and AWS API Gateway traffic collection modules
- Built CI/CD support for Akto and GitHub Actions integration
- Created end-to-end AWS infrastructure using Pulumi for testing module deployment
- Reduced AWS service deployment time from 15 minutes to under 60 seconds
- Further optimized deployment time to 15 seconds using helm charts
- **Tech Stack**: k8s, Java, Vue.js, AWS

roles.title: Software Engineer Intern
roles.description:
- **Team**: Consumer and Small Business Banking Technology Team
- Built a stock ticker dashboard that collected and displayed real-time stock data and insights

about.title: About Me
about.content: The fun-loving guy next door who also happens to be a tech-geek. Solving real-world engineering problems at scale.
